text:
Every year we sacrifice human lives for the sake of our for-profit healthcare system, & next year is poised to get worse.

What happens when your insurance becomes unaffordable, but you “make too much” for Medicaid? Millions go uninsured & underinsured.

We need #MedicareforAll. https://twitter.com/nytnational/status/1244091431742038017 QT @NYTNational U.S. health insurance premiums could increase as much as 40% next year if the coronavirus pandemic results in millions of Americans needing hospital stays, a new analysis warns https://trib.al/za3o8No

Money that goes to bail out big companies should come with serious long-term change: a $15 minimum wage, at least one seat for workers on their board of directors, & no union-busting. And CEOs should face civil & criminal penalties for violating these terms.

MA requested supplies from the Strategic National Stockpile nearly a month ago. Only a fraction ever came. Without Trump’s full & consistent use of the DPA, state officials are still scrambling to find essential equipment but the federal govt has created a logistical black hole.
A one-time $1,200 payment is nowhere near enough. Americans are worried about how they’re going to pay their rent and bills this week. Congress must do more—ASAP.

During this crisis, service workers and gig workers have been hit hard and we cannot allow them to fall through the cracks. If you can, please donate to @onefairwage’s emergency fund, which directly helps those workers struggling to make ends meet: https://secure.actblue.com/donate/kdh-social-ofw?refcode=tw200331 http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EUdYDIdU0AI7qvK.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1245060068338331648/vid/320x320/jteFIi76QP7ewq3u.mp4?tag=13

This #TransDayOfVisibility, I want all trans and non-binary people to know you are valued, you are loved, and that we will keep fighting to make sure you can live freely, safely, and openly exactly as you are.

Today, Chris Smalls was shamefully fired by the wealthiest man in the world @JeffBezos #AmazonStrike 

Sign

Women are still paid on average 80 cents on the dollar.
Black women 61 cents.
Native American women 58 cents. 
Latinas 53 cents. 

This #EqualPayDay, our fight is far from over. It’s past time all of our daughters grew up knowing their work is worth just as much as our sons.

Even one death is too many

But fact that to date U.S. has significantly less deaths than nations with much lower number of cases is a testament to the skill,dedication & bravery of our doctors,nurses & health care professionals

May God bless them & keep them safe

#WeWillWin http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EUcpZk_XsAABsHs.jpg

Incarcerated people with underlying health issues are at particular risk from #COVID19—confinement makes social distancing virtually impossible. At-risk individuals who don’t pose a threat should be released to community supervision—I have a bill outlining how. https://twitter.com/NYTHealth/status/1244625885044629505 QT @NYTHealth A lawyer for prisoners seeking release from a federal jail in Brooklyn said the inmates and their family members were “terrified” that the jail would “very soon be overwhelmed with hundreds of people sick and dying inside.” https://trib.al/9YNxGq0

I said what I said 👏🏽 https://twitter.com/ibrahimpols/status/1245156521320812550 QT @ibrahimpols AOC on the Politico article: “I do think it’s funny that all these folks that are one day like keep your third eye open, manufactured consent are the same ones who fall the fastest for these ploys to demoralize the left.” http://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1245156464307601411/pu/img/oAYwN08snXDeZYW9.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/1245156464307601411/pu/vid/320x568/TrgvWbZFiYU35kuZ.mp4?tag=10

No one deserves to live their life in fear because of who they are. But we cannot ignore the reality of how dangerous it is to be transgender in our country—especially for trans women of color. We can’t stop fighting for equality. #TransDayofVisibility

The coronavirus bill didn’t do enough to stop corporate bailouts, but Treasury Sec. Mnuchin & Fed Chair Powell have vast power to decide how to hand out this money. I sent a detailed list of principles that would protect workers & root out corruption. https://www.washingtonpost.com/opinions/2020/03/31/elizabeth-warren-trump-mnuchin-were-watching-you/

My congresswoman is speaking nothing but truth. #COVID19

Social isolation is real. During these trying times it’s important to check in with our loved ones.

Stay Home. Save Lives. Check In.

Bold: Obama calls for the overwhelming electoral defeat of Joe Biden & Nancy Pelosi, after they opposed & demagogued Trump’s China travel ban, which helped slow the coronavirus pandemic. https://twitter.com/barackobama/status/1245007713387544576 QT @BarackObama We've seen all too terribly the consequences of those who denied warnings of a pandemic. We can't afford any more consequences of climate denial. All of us, especially young people, have to demand better of our government at every level and vote this fall. https://www.latimes.com/politics/story/2020-03-31/trump-rolls-back-fuel-economy-standards

This raises obvious & serious Qs, which much of the media have ZERO interest in answering. Did the virus escape accidentally from a Chinese lab (that we know was studying bat coronaviruses near Wuhan animal market)? Why did the CCP cover up the outbreak? https://www.washingtontimes.com/news/2020/mar/30/china-researchers-isolated-bat-coronaviruses-near-/
RT @morningmoneyben Pretty incredible that we've gone from "hoax" and "totally under control" to a best case scenario of 100K to 200K dead from the #coronavirus. We lost 115K in World War I.

Women should be paid what they rightfully deserve—a salary equal to that of their male coworkers. We must keep shining a light on this injustice until the wage gap is closed once and for all. #EqualPayDay https://twitter.com/NewYorkStateAG/status/1244963368567484419 QT @NewYorkStateAG Women are doctors.
 
Women are nurses.
 
Women are heroes.
 
Women are risking their lives on the frontlines of this pandemic just the same as men, and they deserve equal pay. This #EqualPayDay, it's more important than ever to highlight the pay gap women face every single day.

And you bet I’ll be watching those big corporations to protect workers, consumers, & taxpayers. https://www.warren.senate.gov/oversight/letters/warren-calls-on-mnuchin-and-powell-to-protect-workers-and-root-out-corruption-when-doling-out-new-cares-act-500-billion-bailout-fund

RT @SBAgov The maximum loan amount is up to $10M. All loans under this program will have: 
✔️Interest rate of 0.5%
✔️Maturity of 2 years
✔️First payment deferred for six months
✔️100% guarantee by SBA
✔️No collateral
✔️No personal guarantees
✔️No borrower or lender fees payable to SBA

Women are on the frontlines of this #COVID19 pandemic risking their lives, their safety and their health. This #EqualPayDay it’s never been more important to highlight this pay gap. We must do better. https://twitter.com/nwlc/status/1244989843165319168 QT @nwlc This year’s #EqualPayDay falls during a global pandemic — and women are on the front lines of it. They dominate the jobs facing mass layoffs and those that put their lives at risk every day. This crisis has made it clear that we can’t wait a moment longer to close the wage gap. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EUcXWChXYAI9OmF.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EUcXWCiXgAIaBGY.jpg

During this difficult time for America’s workers, equal pay for equal work remains as important as ever.
 
Read my full statement on #EqualPayDay here: https://www.speaker.gov/newsroom/33120 http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EUdXiIzX0AkYmpu.jpg

Transgender people everywhere deserve to live in dignity and security. Together, we will end hatred and bigotry towards trans Americans and build a nation based on love, justice and civil rights. #TransDayOfVisibility

During the coronavirus crisis, women are working jobs that put their lives at risk – but they’re still not getting equal pay for equal work. That's especially true for women of color. On @BloombergRadio, I talked with @DavidWestin about the 4 priorities we must focus on to #CombatCOVID19:
1⃣Making testing more accurate & widely available
